index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to community and economic development; authorizing and providing for the issuance of notes for the purpose of financing a loan for the acquisition of the Frederick & Nelson building for purposes of redevelopment; authorizing a Funding Approval Agreement and a Contract for Loan Guarantee Assistance with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development for a Section 108 loan guaranty whereby HUD guarantees repayment of the notes; authorizing agreements with a custodian to establish a separate account or fund; and authorizing other related agreements.
